runs.comm: India are away, Parthiv taps a length ball with a little extra bounce to the off side and they scoot across.
length ball, look sot angle across Dhawan who defends off the inside half to the leg side.
short and wide outside off, Dhawan cuts well but can't get it past Barnwell at gully.
Whoa! Dhawan closes the face a little too early, the ball hits a strange spot on the good length area and a huge chunk of turf comes off. Dhawan is hit on the glove and looks a little unruffled.
slides this one down the leg side from over the wicket and it is called a wide.
Rampaul pushes another one down the leg side.
over-pitched outside off, and Dhawan moves nicely into a cover drive but doesn't time it too well.
dicey from Dhawan, feet rooted on leg stump, he flays at a wide ball outside off and misses.

run out chance missed. Short ball outside off, Parthiv dabs it away to the off side and Sammy moves quickly from slip to field it and fire in the throw as Dhawan runs in. A direct hit would have made things interesting.
Dhawan gets a single, length ball on off stump that hinted at straightening in, and Dhawan taps to the leg side for one.

top-shot and superb fielding from Nurse at mid-off. It was over-pitched on the stumps and Parthiv punches it with pristine timing, past the bowler. Nurse moves quickly to his left, dives and stops a sure four.
full and on the leg side, Dhawan drives without timing to the leg side for another single.

in the air, but safe, again the ball rises extra from a length... this pitch is a little up and down. Parthiv fended it to the leg side without control and it landed safely after hanging in the air for a while.
gets the outside edge, but Dhawan keeps it down and gets it past the slip diving away to the left.
Barnwell fumbles at backward point, and that makes the single easy. Dhawan guided it straight to him and took off.

jaffa from Sammy, he produced a few of these against Pakistan. Lands on a length, innocuously and at friendly pace, and then goes into the right hander, away from the left hander. Parthiv plays a lazy whip, and misses.
he gets the single this time, stays back in the crease and drops it into the covers.
Dhawan lines up a big off-drive, and gets good connection, but can't get past mid-off.
India still boundary-less, Parthiv taps into the off side this time and gets a single.

West Indies strike. Dhawan is gone, to a rather forgettable shot. Effort ball from Sammy, and at pace, there's no excuse for not seeing it early. It was banged in short, and bounced extra. Dhawan tried to stay beside the line and guide it over the slips, but never got into position. He ended up angling the bat at it, got the outside edge and the keeper takes it well, jumping up.
another lazy shot from Parthiv, he doesn't move forward enough to the pitch of the ball and then drives on the up. Rampaul's angle takes it away from him and he misses by some distance.
fuller, in Parthiv country, and he deals with it with an up-and-over carved drive over point. Very well timed, nearly a six that.
Rampaul responds with a shorter ball, Parthiv hangs back and defends to the off side. No chance for a single.
well-fielded by the stumps. Length ball on the stumps, and Parthiv absolutely whacks it right back. The stumps come in the way and stop a sure four.
Sammy prowls at point. Kohli is away, staying on the back foot and dabbing backward of point and Sammy keeps him down to a single
yorker of sorts on off stump, Parthiv digs it out to the off side.
full-length ball on off stump, Kohli leans out with assurance and steers to point.
this one angles into the pads, Kohli helps it along with the wrists and he gets the single.

Parthiv's timing is in top-gear, placement not there yet. Over-pitched by Sammy on off stump and Parthiv gets to the pitch and smokes it, but straight to short extra cover. The keeper immediately moves up to the stumps.
short of a length and cutting away, Parthiv stays in the crease and angles it backward of point
wrists from Kohli, ensures he plays late enough to get it backward of point for one.
French Open time in Trinidad. Short ball from Sammy, at amiable pace, it sits up and asks to be smashed, and Parthiv obliges with a fore-handed whack past the bowler.
shot of the morning from Kohli, and off a no-ball too. Over-pitched by Russell outside off and Kohli leans into a pleasing cover drive.

swatted away. If Russell's been watching the IPL, he'd know that this is a trademark Kohli shot. Length ball, angling in towards the pads and Kohli gets the front foot across before swat-flicking it with disdain behind square leg.
short of a length outside off, Kohli taps from the crease into the off side for another single.

pick-up-and-drop! Looking at Parthiv's build, it is tough to imagine he can generate such power, but he is a man with a good knowledge of physics and leverage. Length ball on middle and angling away, the pint-sized dynamo gets half across and whips it all the way over midwicket. Punchy and powerful.
fuller this time and a big drop in pace too, and he tries to repeat the shot but ends up scooping it higher, rather than far. Lands safe though around midwicket.
slower offcutter, short of a length and Parthiv guides backward of point for a single.
finishes with a full ball outside off, Kohli reaches across to steer towards point. That over has ignited India's innings, and indeed India's tour.
Sammy keeps it tight on off stump, Kohli stays put and plays it back.
similar ball, not there for the drive and Kohli defends back to the bowler.
fuller and a touch wider outside off, Kohli opens the blade and plays it into the covers for a single.
Sammy wisely keeps it short of a length, Parthiv dabs from the crease to the point region.

Kohli goes, and it is a moment for the cameramen. Slower ball from Sammy, full and enticing the early drive. Kohli fell for it, getting forward and looking to play across a little early, and he got a big leading edge. It ballooned up between point and cover, and both went for it. Not much calling, as Samuels and Hyatt converged. Almost a collision, but Hyatt holds the ball while Samuels holds Hyatt. And then they argue over who should have taken it!

Sammy on a hat-trick! India have a long line-up, and seem keen to give everyone a chance today. Parthiv falls to the lack of pace this time, the offcutter gripped and came through late as he tried to square drive, and he ended up scooping it to point who had to jump up and pouch it.
offbreak, big one as it comes in sharp and Badri dabs it backward of point for one.
whoa, this one turns even bigger and Raina is completely beaten as he reaches out to defend. Grip and turn, misses the off stump.
length ball, Raina gets to the pitch this time and defends into the off side.
again, Raina stays calm at the start, plays it into the covers.
Raina is away, pushes an offbreak turning away into the covers and gives it to Badri.

Badri is in some form, and it is showing already. Lovely little steer and it runs away to third man. Full ball tossed up and breaking in, Badri leans out languidly, opens the face at an impossible angle and gets it past the keeper . Third man did not have a chance.
Raina stays in the crease and dabs through point for another single. No hat-trick then.
nice, tight length ball on off stump, Badri covers the line and plays it back to the bowler.
offcutter strays down, Badri glances down to fine leg for one more.

Captain takes captain out! Sammy has four, and he's been a revelation with the ball this Caribbean summer. Length ball, it is just the nagging hold he has had on the batsmen that has brought this about. The ball landed on a length and seemed to grip again, came off slower than Raina thought and he went for the expansive loft over midwicket. Ended up miscuing it straight to mid-on, who takes it well running back.
full from Sammy, Badri covers the line and defends.
end of an excellent spell, Sammy finishes with another innocuous back of length ball, nipping in ever so slightly. Badri works it to square leg for one.
Badri gets it away through the off side again, he's playing late and this is crucial on this track. Steered with loose wrists backward of point.
over-pitched on the stumps, and Badri works it around to midwicket with the turn.
Rohit is away, nudging with the spin towards square leg.
short of a length outside off, Badri cuts comfortably backward of point.
tossed well up, Rohit reaches out to the length and plays it to point.
shorter this time, Rohit forces it into the covers for another single.
short of a length to start off, Rohit whips it through midwicket for one.
better length, closer to Badri but not full enough for the drive, and Badri defends.
touch of turn away from Badri who eases into a defensive push towards point.
shorter and straighter, Badri gets it through midwicket for a single.
tossed well up to Rohit who reaches the pitch and drives down the ground.
too short, and Badri capitalises with the pull, though he doesn't time it that well. Couple to midwicket.
stays back and plays it out towards point.,
nice drift from Nurse, gets this to curl away and rip past Badri's attempt to drive.
shorter this time, and it turns in huge as Badri looks to dab backward of point. Can't get it away.
this one turns down the leg side, and is called wide.
another big offbreak coming in, Badri guides against the spin into the covers.
Rohit is beaten outside off, Nurse is showing some interesting variations here, this one holds its line.
and a sharp offbreak to end the over, Rohit is cramped as he defends in a hurry.
Badri cuts away, single to deep cover-point.
Devendra Warne. That ball turned a mile and some, as Rohit leaned out and tried to defend. Not even close to getting bat on it.
Rohit goes inside out, languid work of the wrists to pick that up and time it so well with the spin.
half-stop from Bishoo, Rohit reaches across and whips to his left and Bishoo dives to parry it away. Can't stop the single.
yorks him nearly, on leg stump, and Badri jams it away to the leg side.
ah, good shot but finds the fielder. Badri unfurls the late cut, but plays it straight to short third man., India in need of some momentum.
Nurse drops him. That's not what the doctor ordered. Short ball, turning in and sitting up at Rohit who is surprised by the extra bounce and pats it tamely back. Nurse clangs a sitter.
this time, Rohit stays in the crease and glances with the turn for one.
thin outside edge, Badri's got some runs in that region, but this time it's more out of fortune. The keeper can't get glove on it, and it easily beats third man.
Badri works a fuller ball with the ball, straight through the leg side.
Rohit this time, reaches out and drives with the turn past the bowler.
shorter, Badri gets it away to deep point for another single.
angles one into Badri's pads and he works it with the angle straight to backward square leg.
shorter, on off stump, Badri stays in the crease and steers very fine for another single.
tight lines from Barnwell, cuts into Rohit who works it to the square leg region from one more.
fuller length, Badri sets about a pleasing whip through midwicket.
slow full toss, Rohit wasn't even close to picking it and ended up toe-ending a slog straight to midwicket.
slow legcutter this time, Rohit tries his best to get some muscle into the shot but still mistimes into the off side for a single.
slow bouncer, Rohit is completely off-colour today as he fails to spot another one and misses the pull. He is hit on the ribs as the ball pops away towards gully.
Badri backs away a touch to make his own room and steers straight to third man for another single.
slower ball at 69.7 mph, Rohit awaits in earnest and eventually guides it through point for one.

Samuels has taken a screamer and Badri's innings is over. Or is it? It might be a no-ball! What a tragedy! Stunner at cover, it initially got the crowd and the lovely ladies in the stands on their feet. It was over-pitched on off stump, and Badri slotted the cover-drive powerfully if somewhat uppishly, but Samuels moved rapidly to latch on as he stretched to his right. All goes waste.  Rampaul has over-stepped, the third umpire says belatedly.

another near-catch, another stupendous effort in the deep, this time from Nurse. Here's what happened: Badri stayed in the crease and got under a length ball on off stump, and tried to hoist it over extra-cover. He couldn't get as much elevation as he wanted, and it seemed set to land a couple of feet inside the ropes. Nurse at wide long-off, hurried across, dived full-length and got the ball in his grasp as he sprawled forward. He kept sliding along, and the momentum was taking him towards the ropes. He tried to flick it away before touching the rope, but replays say he might have touched. It's been ruled a four, which is a little weird. That was either six, or two. Might have touched the ground before touching the rope.
Badri plays the glide down to third man once again, some luck going his way here. Another single
majestic from Rohit, skips down the pitch to West Indies' fastest bowler, converts a decent ball into a length offering, and slams it down the ground for a big six.

India are opening up now. Badri's turn, he backs away to the leg side, gets beside an over-pitched ball and thumps the extra cover drive, with the elbow high, and the flourish in the follow through in place.
short of a length, on off stump and Badri plays it back.
whips a fuller ball through midwicket, Barnwell fumbles and gives them two.

Huge appeal for a stumping, and it has not been referred. Badri might have got away again. Big legbreak from Bishoo, turns big and Badri misses the drive. The keeper has the bails off in a flash, and Badri might have been on the crease, not inside.
Badri skates out to a full toss and slams it straight down the ground for another four runs. Once he got to the pitch, it was easy pickings.
inside out this time, Badri's feet are working overtime, he gets to the pitch and launches Bishoo through extra cover.
roobish ball as Messrs. Boycott would say. Full and a metre down the leg side. Five wides.
on a length around off stump, Rohit check-drives into the covers for one.
Badri stays on the crease and angles a length ball to short third man for one.
clubbed. Clouted. Clobbered. Take your pick. Length ball angling into Rohit, who gets under it and whacks the leather off it, before the ball lands in the greens behind long-on.
six and out. Barnwell bowls a very similar ball, tempting Rohit to have another go. Rohit obliges, looks to go straighter this time, but just misses a straight ball and the furniture is rearranged.
Barnwell slips another one down the leg side.
fuller length, Yusuf pushes into the covers.

some types of batsmen like to go after certain types of bowlers. For Yusuf, that certain type in this West Indies attack is Barnwell. Back of length ball - check. Zero pace - check. On middle and leg - check. Ball in the midwicket stands - check.

the un-outable has been outed. Classic piece of legspin deception from Bishoo. Who said there can't be beauty in T20s? 19th over of the innings.. the leggie comes on and tosses it up with drift, temptingly on leg stump. Badri senses a kill, and skips out to the pitch, but falls just short as the ball drops on him, lands, grips and tweaks away past the bat. The keeper does the rest. Late clarification: Badri got an edge as he toppled out of the crease, and was hence caught. Not stumped.
full again, on leg stump, Harbhajan plays it back to the bowler.
handly hoick from Harbhajan, gets under a tossed up ball and whacks it to midwicket for one
shorter outside off, Harbhajan forehands it down to mid-off for one more. Yusuf likes to play spin.

there's a nice blue sky in Trinidad, and there's a ball soaring through it. And now it lands in the member's pavilion, and it's beautifully taken by a man in the crowd. Not full enough from Bishoo, it breaks away from Yusuf who frees his arms and sends it into orbit. Swirler.
nearly yorks him in response, and Yusuf plays it into the midwicket area for one.
too wide outside off, Yusuf lets it go.
full toss, swerving into the pads, and whipped without timing to midwicket for one.
oh boy, Harbhajan has sent that into downtown Trinidad. Length from Rampaul, gets the yorkers in mate! Harbhajan isn't complaining, as he swings merrily over midwicket.
full toss outside off, Harbhajan is confused by the height and mistimes into the covers for one
that's the length. Perfect yorker at 84 mph, and Yusuf digs it out to midwicket for one.
superb hands from Harbhajan. Rampaul misses the yorker by a foot. It ends up a fulltoss on the middle and leg, Harbhajan whips it with unbecoming felicity and redirects it to the midwicket fence.

Harbhajan looks to chop away outside off, and under-edges to the keeper and ambles across. Fletcher collects and throws the stumps down at the striker's end, but Yusuf makes it. Might have wanted to throw at the other end. India finish with a strong score for this pitch.
